author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Freedom Foods Group H1 ‍Profit Attributable Down 34.1 Pct To $3 Mln​
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Freedom Foods Group Ltd:
* ‍PROFIT FOR HALF-YEAR ATTRIBUTABLE DOWN 34.1% TO $3 MILLION​
* ‍HY REVENUES FROM ORDINARY ACTIVITIES UP 28.8% TO $159.6 MILLION​
* ‍DECLARED A FULLY FRANKED INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 2.25 CENTS PER SHARE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
